metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2820 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Firefox Health Reports (aka FHR or about:healthreport) feature in Mozilla Firefox before 46.0 does not properly restrict the origin of events, which makes it easier for remote attackers to modify sharing preferences by leveraging access to the remote-report IFRAME element.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2820` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
